issue.title: patreon.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://patreon.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fpatreon.com) ### Comment Username: @infinitewaveparticle > First of all, in the AdGuard app, I selected "Missed ad or tracker", but when this form was loaded there was no option to select "Missed tracker". Anyway, this report is to let you know that there is a tracker in Patreon emails for when you choose to load remote content (images, etc). The tracking server is shown in the screenshot as blocked because I have manually added it to the user filter. I suggest that you add it to your DNS and regular lists as well. The server is "email.mailgun.patreon.com" and is used to track users who load their emails. Please block it. Blocking it manually has not affected the images loading in the emails. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/BVf4Naq.jpg)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- Platform: | Android 8.0.0 AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Android v4.0 nightly 24 (65) Browser: | ProtonMail email app AdGuard mode: | VPN Filtering quality: | High-quality HTTPS filtering: | enabled Stealth mode options: | Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header,
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests,
Block third-party Authorization header,
Self-destructing first-party cookies (60),
Self-destructing third-party cookies (5),
Disable cache for third-party requests,
Block WebRTC,
Block Push API,
Block Location API,
Hide your User-Agent (),
Hide your IP address (107.178.250.75) DNS filtering: | server: `https://1.1.1.1/dns-query,https://1.0.0.1/dns-query`
filters: `https://filters.adtidy.org/android/filters/2_optimized.txt, https://raw.githubusercontent.com/OsborneSystems/Columbia/master/Columbia.txt, https://filters.adtidy.org/android/filters/15_optimized.txt, https://badmojr.github.io/1Hosts/Pro/domains.txt, https://easylist.to/easylist/easyprivacy.txt, https://filters.adtidy.org/android/filters/3_optimized.txt, http://pgl.yoyo.org/adservers/serverlist.php?hostformat=adblockplus&mimetype=plaintext, https://abp.oisd.nl/basic/, https://filters.adtidy.org/android/filters/11_optimized.txt, DnsUserRules` Filters: | Ad Blocking:

labels.name: A: In progress

labels.name: A: Waiting for data
labels.description: Waiting for more information from the user

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://spil.coopmedlem.dk/2022-uge37-shopping-bosch?win=false&appver=22.15.1&adobe_mc=TS%3D1663486060%7CMCMID%3D829778871879](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fspil.coopmedlem.dk%2F2022-uge37-shopping-bosch%3Fwin%3Dfalse%26appver%3D22.15.1%26adobe_mc%3DTS%253D1663486060%257CMCMID%253D829778871879) ### Comment Username: @JulianVilladsen > The website is used by this app: > https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=dk.coop.coopplus > > It allows members of this grocery store chain to play a game to win products. I've won multiple times and received my price in the store. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/YwyF55y.jpg)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/DLqFGf8.jpg)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- Platform: | Adguard DNS Browser: | Chrome Filters: | Other:
AdGuard DNS

comment.body:
Sorry for not responding.

The button is called "Spil og vind" ("Play and win"). It is not always available and it is not available without an account.

I just tried it, and it was not blocked, so did you allow it?
